pages.text: Hammerhead Sharks are neutral fish that likes to live in warmer waters.$(br2)They will only attack any creature that is beneath half health and they special preys: tropical fish and squids.$(br2)Occasionally, when attacking prey, the Hammerhead may loose one Shark Tooth. This can be used to craft Shark Tooth Arrows.
Those can travel better underwater and deal extra damage to aquatic creatures.
